product_name: Mountain Hardwear Nambia 2-in-1 Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With its athletic yet feminine fit, the Mountain Hardwear Nambia 2-in-1Tank Top features a printed sport tank with an uber-light outer tank. It's a great stretchy combo for climbing or yoga. Built-in shelf bra provides support. Mountain Hardwear Nambia 2-in-1Tank Top stretches, wicks moisture and dries fast. Twisting back-strap detail on the outer tank adds style. Closeout.
short_description: With its athletic yet feminine fit, the Mountain Hardwear Nambia 2-in-1Tank Top features a printed sport tank with an uber-light outer tank. It's a great stretchy combo for climbing or yoga.
